name: Tales of the Blue Valley - EARLY ACCESS
name_original: Tales of the Blue Valley - EARLY ACCESS
description:
Synopsis

Life should be perfect for a country mouse like you, but you long for adventure and adventure has found you!

Save your village and solve the mystery of the floating spire by solving puzzles in a beautiful and relaxing environment. Designed for children 6-12 but popular with stressed students looking for a mental break!

Features

4 different puzzles, 3 with multiple levels of increasing difficulty

Original soundtrack composed by Montreal jazz sensation: Colin Lloyd

Android version coming soon!

Tales of the Blue Valley is currently in development! Please play our Early Access demo and tell us what you think!

Tech Requirements

PC

Operating System: Windows XP SP2+, Mac OS X 10.8+

Graphics Card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities

CPU: SSE2 instruction set support

RAM: 1GB

MAC

Operating System: Mac OS X 10.8+

Graphics Card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities

CPU: SSE2 instruction set support

RAM: 1GB

Credits

Project Manager/QA: Forrest Wieler

Art Lead/Programmer: Meagan Byrne

Puzzle Designer/Animator: Elana Cincinatus

Technical Lead/Programmer: Ash Lloyd

Music Composer: Colin Lloyd
